title: McBain
description: All seven McBain films! Not just another shoot-em-up, push em through the plate glass window, splatter fest from the Hollywood cookie cutter.
altHero: McBabe swoons at McBain through a shattered glass window
alt1: McBain shoots a hole in a manual the police chief is holding and the wall behind it
alt2: McBain powers up a huge gun
alt3: Scoey has been shot in a diner and McBain asks “Why?!” with a bloody hand to the sky
alt4: McBain in a torn shirt looks at the ground from a cargo plane on fire
